verbs.description: it [ARGM-TMP: time] to [V: stop] [ARG1: whitewashing civil rights history] the african american civil rights movement of the 1950s and 1960s failed more than it succeeded yet in the popular history of the civil rights movement we never talk about its failures popular african american civil rights movement martin luther king jr rights
